text: Tasmātiha bhikkhave vedanāsu vedanānupassī tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ
edit: Tasmātiha bhikkhave vedanāsu vedanānupassī tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ

translations.transtext: Therefore, monks, in that occasion [that] monk lives, being one who see a feeling in feelings, strenuous, thoughtful, mindful, removing avarice and grief in the world.
